home.intro: I'm currently studying %Computer Science% at Hogeschool Rotterdam but already have %4+ years of experience% in software development, primarily %C#% and %TypeScript%. For school projects I have also worked a lot with %Python%.

privacy.message: Good news: The watchface doesn't collect any data!

projects.title: Projects
projects.intro: Below are some of the projects I've worked on with relevant links and tags. Feel free to check them out and let me know what you think!
projects.view-demo: View a live demo of project '{name}'
projects.view-on-play-store: View the app on the Google Play Store

top-languages.title: Top languages
top-languages.description: The languages I use most in my projects, in bytes. All this data comes directly from GitHub.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Got any questions or tips? Feel free to reach out to me via an email ({email}) or this contact form!
contact.name: Your Name
contact.email-error: Please enter a valid email address.
contact.message-error: Please enter a message longer than 10 characters and shorter than 4096 characters.
contact.sent: Your message has been delivered, thank you! I'll get back to you as soon as I can.
contact.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.
contact.robot-challenge: Sorry, but your input seems to be from a robot. If that's not the case, press "Back" to send the form.
